author: Chris Davie
title: John Terry slams claims that he’s unhappy with Antonio Conte at Chelsea
text:
John Terry was reportedly unhappy at being left out against Manchester United. (Getty Images) John Terry has hit back at reports claiming he was unhappy at being left out of Chelsea’s FA Cup clash against Manchester United on Monday.
The Sun claims that the Chelsea captain is among the fringe players who were ‘disappointed’ at being left out of the quarter-final tie at Stamford Bridge.
Conte opted to field his strongest side for the fixture against Jose Mourinho’s side, despite rotating his team in the earlier rounds.
On Thursday, Terry posted an image of the story on Instagram along with the caption: ‘Completely untrue.’

 
Earlier this season in an interview with Steven Gerrard for BT Sport, Terry admitted that he would settle for a place on Chelsea’s bench if it meant the team won the Premier League.
‘I genuinely mean when I say it, but for me I am honestly hoping I don’t play this season which means they keep winning,’ he said.

‘Do you get that from a player who plays but moaning every week? I’ve not moaned once.’
